info.title: Alchemy Relation Extraction API
info.description: AlchemyAPI is capable of identifying Subject-Action-Object relations within your HTML, text, or web-based content. We employ sophisticated statistical algorithms and natural language processing technology to analyze your information, extracting the semantic richness embedded within.
